Hc xác sut thng kê qua phn mm R Tan-Duc Nguyen 2022-04-11 Chapter 1 Stat learning tanduc307@gmail.com
Chapter 2 How to use tools 2.1 To th mc làm vic 2.2 Chèn hình nh 2.3 Chèn video 2.4 Vn phm ting Anh 2.5 Trích dn 2.6 Cú pháp Markdown 2.7 Setup Github cho RStudio 2.8 Tham kho

Chapter 2 How to use tools 2.1 To th mc làm vic Khi s dng Rstudio thì nên to th mc project  toàn b files s nm trong ó. Cách thc hin xem  ây https://alexd106.github.io/intro2R/howto.html#rstudio_proj-vid Li th là trong folder project này, ta có th to các folder con nh images, data, tables,   thun tin lu riêng tng loi d liu. [hin ti làm sao  cu hình cho hình nh nó t ng lu theo tng folder thì cha bit cách, thy có package here mà không bit cách dùng). Lu ý là khi dùng bookdown  render books thì tên ca heading là ghi ting Anh cho lành, vì nu ghi ting Vit thì nó render b li unicode. RStudio Projects from intro 2R on Vimeo. 2.2 Chèn hình nh Có các cách chèn hình khi s dng Rstudio nh sau:  Chuyn qua ch  Visual ri insert hình nh. Sau ó hình nh s c lu trong folder _book/images khi render bng knitr.  Nu gõ theo kiu source code thì dùng on mã sau ``` {r echo=TRUE, paged.print=FALSE, out.width="30%"} knitr::include_graphics("images/cover.jpg") ``` knitr::include_graphics("images/cover.jpg")  Nu copy và paste t trên Internet thì dùng add-on imageclipr <https://github.com/Toniiiio/imageclipr>. Hình nh s lu mc nh trong working directory.  Nu copy và paste hình nh theo kiu th công thì hình nh mc nh s lu  C:/Users/tandu/AppData/Local/RStudio/tmp/paste-B717C571.png nh vy thì khi xut bn online s không thy. Do ó phi a hình nh vào trong th mc project (theo kiu th công) hoc dùng add-on imageclipr theo kiu trc tip trong Rstudio (nhng  dng Rmarkdown, còn Rmarkdown visual thì b li). 2.3 Chèn video S dng link này https://video-to-markdown.marcomontalbano.com/ (theo kiu click vào hình ri direct qua source  play video) Chèn t Youtube, s dng code embed ri paste vào. <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RLxV3T2b524" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe> Tuy nhiên video s không t ng resize theo khung ca s Nên dùng code này  video t ng resize. Chiu rng và cao 100% có ngha là theo khung ca s ch không phi theo kích thc gc ca video. <div style="position:relative;padding-bottom:56.25%;"> <iframe style="width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;left:0px;top:0px;" frameborder="0" width="100%" height="100%" allowfullscreen src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RLxV3T2b524"> </iframe> </div> Chèn t Github, lu ý v trí ng dn ca file (k c trong sub folder phi chính xác) và repo phi to Gitpage. Video s play khi m bng trình duyt. <div style="position:relative;padding-bottom:56.25%;"> <iframe style="width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;left:0px;top:0px;" frameborder="0" width="100%" height="100%" allowfullscreen src="https://tanduc307.github.io/xstk/images/thanks.mp4"> </iframe> </div> Có th dùng package vembedr https://ijlyttle.github.io/vembedr/  insert video cho nhanh. 2.4 Vn phm ting Anh Cách s dng du ba chm ellipses. https://t.me/c/1605387342/140 Cách chèn âm thanh vào theo cách upload lên github ri play t URL. Cha tìm ra cách play t source trên hard disk. S dng package embedr https://github.com/mccarthy-m-g/embedr library(embedr) embed_audio(src = "https://tanduc307.github.io/light/An%20ellipsis%20(plural_%20ellipses)%20is%20a%20punctuation%20mark%20consisting%20of%20three%20dots..mp3") Your browser does not support the audio tag; for browser support, please see: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_audio.asp 2.5 Trích dn Xem hng dn  ây là làm c https://inbo.github.io/tutorials/tutorials/r_citations_markdown/ 2.6 Cú pháp Markdown Xem  ây https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/ 2.7 Setup Github cho RStudio Mc ích là  thun tin lu tr toàn b d liu ca d án R mà khi cn copy, save as th công. https://intro2r.com/github_r.html Khi có file nào ó thay i thì  Tab Git này s update ngay. Ta ch cn chn Ctrl+A ri Space  select all sau ó commit ri mi push lên server Git  lu tr. 2.8 Tham kho https://rstats.wtf/

Chapter 3 ANOVA RCBD Dataset (Somasegaran and Hoben 1985) gs4_deauth() giúp cho không cn xác thc API t googlesheet. File raw library(googlesheets4) gs4_deauth() data_rcbd <- read_sheet('1dFmKOhpYABrPR_e5MF27W2LSbaAGdt5dFVV3zc1H47I') ##  Reading from "raw_data". ##  Range 'Sheet1'. print(data_rcbd, n = Inf) ## # A tibble: 48 x 3 ## 34 block3 TAL379 10.5 ## 35 block3 TAL206 10.2 ## 36 block3 TAL435 8.22 ## 37 block3 TAL411 8.46 ## 38 block3 ALLEN527 8.62 ## 39 block3 TAL211 9.14 ## 40 block3 TAL487 8.35 ## 41 block3 CB1795 5.7 ## 42 block3 TAL650 6.83 ## 43 block3 TAL649 8.1 ## 44 block3 TAL860 6.54 ## 45 block3 TAL183 5.51 ## 46 block3 TAL378 5.07 ## 47 block3 CONTROL1 1.8 ## 48 block3 CONTROL2 5.83 ANOVA library(agricolae) outAOV <- aov(yield ~ block + treatment, data = data_rcbd) outAOV ## Call: ## aov(formula = yield ~ block + treatment, data = data_rcbd) ## ## Terms: ## block treatment Residuals ## Sum of Squares 2.42538 217.47868 27.94669 ## Deg. of Freedom 2 15 30 ## ## Residual standard error: 0.9651716 ## Estimated effects may be unbalanced Check assumptions plot(fitted(outAOV), residuals(outAOV)) hist(residuals(outAOV)) lines(density(residuals(outAOV))) hist(residuals(outAOV), prob = TRUE) lines(density(residuals(outAOV))) library(ggpubr) ## Loading required package: ggplot2 ggqqplot(residuals(outAOV)) ANOVA table anova(outAOV) ## Analysis of Variance Table ## ## Response: yield ## Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F) ## block 2 2.425 1.2127 1.3018 0.287 ## treatment 15 217.479 14.4986 15.5638 3.284e-10 *** ## Residuals 30 27.947 0.9316 ## --- ## Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 t-test LSD outFactorial <-LSD.test (outAOV, c("treatment"), main = "yield ~ block + treatment",console=TRUE) ## Chapter 4 Guide 4.1 Inline formatting 4.2 Listings 4.3 Media 4.4 Images 4.5 Math expressions 4.6 Number and reference equations 4.7 Theorems and proofs 4.8 Text references 4.9 R code 4.10 Figures 4.11 Tables

Chapter 4 Guide 4.1 Inline formatting work or work yes or yes H2O Ca2+ code Small Caps RStudio Footnote1 If you do not want a certain heading to be numbered, you can add {-} after the heading, e.g # Preface {-} Blockquotes are written after >, e.g., Love the life you live, Live the life you love.  Bob Marley Code blocks 4.2 Listings Unordered list items start with *, -, or +, and you can nest one list within another list by indenting the sub-list by four spaces, e.g., one item one item one item one item one item Ordered list items start with numbers (the rule for nested lists is the same as above), e.g., the first item the second item the third item 4.3 Media Mình ci thôi em 4.4 Images Chèn theo syntax trong markdown Chèn t link s dng th HTML <img src="link.png" alt="caption" style="height: 100px; width:100px;"/> Xem thêm https://www.markdownguide.org/hacks/#image-size 4.5 Math expressions Ma trn dãy s \[\begin{array}{ccc} x_{11} & x_{12} & x_{13}\\ x_{21} & x_{22} & x_{23} \end{array}\] Ma trn \[X = \begin{bmatrix}1 & x_{1}\\ 1 & x_{2}\\ 1 & x_{3} \end{bmatrix}\] \[\Theta = \begin{pmatrix}\alpha & \beta\\ \gamma & \delta \end{pmatrix}\] \[\begin{vmatrix}a & b\\ c & d \end{vmatrix}=ad-bc\] 4.6 Number and reference equations \[\begin{equation} f\left(k\right) = \binom{n}{k} p^k\left(1-p\right)^{n-k} \tag{4.1} \end{equation}\] You may refer to it using \@ref(eq:binom), e.g., see Equation (4.1). Công thc mô t a normal frequency curve \[\begin{equation} f = \frac{N}{{(\sigma \sqrt {2\pi } )}}{e^{ - {{(y - \mu )}^2}/2{\sigma ^2}}} \tag{4.2} \end{equation}\] You may refer to it using \@ref(eq:normal), e.g., see Equation (4.2). Nu không ánh s công thc thì dùng equation* \[\begin{equation*} \frac{d}{dx}\left( \int_{a}^{x} f(u)\,du\right)=f(x) \end{equation*}\] Nu ghi theo kiu align thì áp dng \[\begin{align} g(X_{n}) &= g(\theta)+g'({\tilde{\theta}})(X_{n}-\theta) \notag \\ \sqrt{n}[g(X_{n})-g(\theta)] &= g'\left({\tilde{\theta}}\right) \sqrt{n}[X_{n}-\theta ] \tag{4.3} \end{align}\] S dng \notag  giúp không ánh s công thc  hàng u tiên ca (4.3) Nu s dng split thì áp dng \[\begin{equation} \begin{split} \mathrm{Var}(\hat{\beta}) & =\mathrm{Var}((X'X)^{-1}X'y)\\ & =(X'X)^{-1}X'\mathrm{Var}(y)((X'X)^{-1}X')'\\ & =(X'X)^{-1}X'\mathrm{Var}(y)X(X'X)^{-1}\\ & =(X'X)^{-1}X'\sigma^{2}IX(X'X)^{-1}\\ & =(X'X)^{-1}\sigma^{2} \end{split} \tag{4.4} \end{equation}\] 4.7 Theorems and proofs Theorem 4.1 (Pythagorean theorem) For a right triangle, if \(c\) denotes the length of the hypotenuse and \(a\) and \(b\) denote the lengths of the other two sides, we have \[a^2 + b^2 = c^2\] 4.8 Text references You can assign some text to a label and reference the text using the label elsewhere in your document. This can be particularly useful for long figure/table captions. 4.9 R code There are two types of R code in R Markdown/knitr documents: R code chunks, and inline R code. The syntax for the latter is `r R_CODE`, and it can be embedded inline with other document elements. 4.10 Figures If we assign a figure caption to a code chunk via the chunk option fig.cap, R plots will be put into figure environments, which will be automatically labeled and numbered, and can also be cross-referenced. The label of a figure environment is generated from the label of the code chunk. Cross reference cho Figure 4.1 par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1)) plot(pressure, pch = 19, type = 'b') Figure 4.1: A figure example with the specified aspect ratio, width, and alignment. Chèn hai  th 4.2 par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1)) plot(pressure, pch = 19, type = 'b') plot(cars, pch = 19) Figure 4.2: Two plots placed side by side. Chèn hình nh knitr::include_graphics('images/michael.jpg') Figure 4.3: Never let anyone know your mind. Chèn lp li hình nh knitr::include_graphics(rep('images/turtle.jpg', 3)) Figure 4.4: Finding good land. 4.11 Tables Like figures, tables with captions will also be numbered and can be referenced. Table 4.1 is a simple example. knitr::kable( head(mtcars[, 1:8], 10), booktabs = TRUE, caption = 'A table of the first 10 rows of the mtcars data.' ) Table 4.1: A table of the first 10 rows of the mtcars data. mpg cyl disp hp drat wt qsec vs Mazda RX4 21.0 6 160.0 110 3.90 2.620 16.46 0 Mazda RX4 Wag 21.0 6 160.0 110 3.90 2.875 17.02 0 Datsun 710 22.8 4 108.0 93 3.85 2.320 18.61 1 Hornet 4 Drive 21.4 6 258.0 110 3.08 3.215 19.44 1 Hornet Sportabout 18.7 8 360.0 175 3.15 3.440 17.02 0 Valiant 18.1 6 225.0 105 2.76 3.460 20.22 1 Duster 360 14.3 8 360.0 245 3.21 3.570 15.84 0 Merc 240D 24.4 4 146.7 62 3.69 3.190 20.00 1 Merc 230 22.8 4 140.8 95 3.92 3.150 22.90 1 Merc 280 19.2 6 167.6 123 3.92 3.440 18.30 1 If you want to put multiple tables in a single table environment, wrap the data objects (usually data frames in R) into a list. See Table 4.2 for an example. Please note that this feature is only available in HTML and PDF output. knitr::kable( list( head(iris[, 1:2], 3), head(mtcars[, 1:3], 5) ), caption = 'A Tale of Two Tables.', booktabs = TRUE ) Table 4.2: A Tale of Two Tables. Sepal.Length Sepal.Width 5.1 3.5 4.9 3.0 4.7 3.2 mpg cyl disp Mazda RX4 21.0 6 160 Mazda RX4 Wag 21.0 6 160 Datsun 710 22.8 4 108 Hornet 4 Drive 21.4 6 258 Hornet Sportabout 18.7 8 360 Longtable. Nu dùng trong HTML thì áp dng on code. Còn nu dùng trong PDF thì add \usepackage{longtable} vào phn LaTeX preamble. knitr::kable( iris[1:55, ], longtable = TRUE, booktabs = TRUE, caption = 'A table generated by the longtable package.' ) Table 4.3: A table generated by the longtable package.
